page.title: 12HARWICH'S CUSTOMIZED SCOOTER
page.content: WE WENT TO INTERVIEW JEREMY HOWLETT ABOUT HIS CUSTOMISED MOTOR SCOOTER.WHEN HE FIRST BOUGHT IT,IT COST HIM Â£10 BECAUSE IT WAS IN PIECES.HE SAID IT IS NOW THE BEST IN BRITAIN.HE CALLED IT "DAZZLE" BECAUSE HIS FAVOURITE POP GROUP IS SIOUXSIE AND THE BANSHEES.HE GETS ALL HIS SPARE PARTS FROM THE MIDLAND SCOOTER CENTRE IN NOTTINGHAM.DAVE WEBSTER TUNED THE ENGINE,AND PAUL KARSLAKE FROM NOTTINGHAM DID THE PAINT WORK.THE ENGRAVING WAS DONE BY DON BLOCKSIDGE FROM BIRMINGHAM.ALTOGETHER IT COST HIM Â£4,500 AND IS NOW WORTH OVER Â£6,000.JEREMY'S SCOOTER WON THE "BEST SCOOTER IN ENGLAND" COMPETITION,AND HE HAS WON THIRTY TROPHIES.HIS BIKE HAS BEEN PICTURED IN EVERY SCOOTER MAGAZINE AVAILABLE.
